events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit and I don’t want to keep it.
The reported issue was identified as a refund request related to order size and customer dissatisfaction.
This case was assigned to agent Sarah M. to handle the refund request promptly and professionally.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand you'd like a refund for your recent jacket purchase. How can I assist you today?
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you wish to return the jacket so I can process your refund accordingly?
The order number is 12345678. The jacket is too small despite the size chart, and I would like to return it and receive my money back.
Thank you for the details. I’ve initiated the refund process. You’ll receive a prepaid shipping label via email to return the jacket. Once we receive it, we will refund you within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick reply and clear instructions. I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving the label soon.
The refund process has been set up successfully, and the shipping label was sent to your email. We consider this case resolved for now.
Just checking in to confirm that you’ve received the shipping label and that the jacket return is progressing smoothly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since your refund was processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
